participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, but struggles with authority.
participant_1.background: We help each other out in my family. When I cut loose, I lose control. I work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager. I despise my boss. I lived most of my life not knowing who Bob Marley was.

participant_2.name: Claire
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, with a strong sense of ethics.
participant_2.background: I am studying literature. I am a vegan. I like to draw. I am from France.

content.text: Nice to meet you, I'm participant_2.
What do you do for a living?
I'm studying literature at the moment.
That's cool! I've always loved to read.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
I have a few, but I'd have to say The Catcher in the Rye.
Oh, that's a great book! I love J.D. Salinger's writing.
Yeah, he's one of my favorite authors.
Oh, really? That's interesting. Why did you decide to go vegan?
I'm just not a fan of eating animals. I think it's cruel and unnecessary.
I respect that. I'm not vegan myself, but I do try to eat less meat.
That's good. I think it's important to be conscious of the impact our food choices have on the environment.
I agree. I'm glad to meet someone else who cares about the environment.
Me too. It's good to know that there are other people out there who are passionate about the same things I am.
